title: Red velvet beetroot cake
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons lemon juice', '135g beetroot, boiled and grated', '310g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '400g caster sugar', '50g unsweetened cocoa powder', '285g unsalted butter, melted', '4 eggs, beaten', '2 tablespoons honey', '125ml milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons cream', '75g cream cheese', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt', '450g icing sugar']
